Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for enemy characters.

behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Used to determine the action parameters to use for this enemy.

aiThinkId.Wiki: The think parameters to use for this enemy.

nameId.Wiki: The name to display for this entity. Only appears on the health bar of c0000 characters.

turnVellocity.Wiki: The rotation speed of the enemy. In degrees per second.

hitHeight.Wiki: Vertical radius of hitbox used for character to character collision. Requires useRagdoll = false

hitRadius.Wiki: Horizontal radius of hitbox used for character to character collision. Requires useRagdoll = false

hitYOffset.Wiki: The vertical offset of the character's hitbox. Will cause them to float.

getSoul.Wiki: The amount of souls dropped on death by this character.

itemLotId_1.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_2.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_3.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_4.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_5.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

itemLotId_6.Wiki: The ID of the item lot to use for item drops for this character's death.

humanityLotId.Wiki: The humanity item lot to use for humanity rewards upon this character's death.

spEffectID0.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID1.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID2.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID3.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID4.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID5.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID6.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

spEffectID7.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character.

GameClearSpEffectID.Wiki: The ID of a SpEffect that affect this character that only applies on NG+ and higher. Used to scale enemy stats for each NG+ journey.

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Physical damage taken when this character is guarding.

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Magic damage taken when this character is guarding.

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Fire damage taken when this character is guarding.

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: The percentage reduction in Lightning damage taken when this character is guarding.

animIdOffset.Wiki: A value to offset animation IDs by. 0 = a00, 10000 = a01, etc.

moveAnimId.Wiki: The movement animation to use for this character.

spMoveAnimId1.Wiki: The special movement animation to use for this character.

spMoveAnimId2.Wiki: The special movement animation to use for this character.

networkWarpDist.Wiki: The distance at which to warp this character instead of allowing standard movement during network synchronization.

dbgBehaviorR1.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorL1.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorR2.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorL2.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRL.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRR.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRD.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorRU.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLL.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLR.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLD.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

dbgBehaviorLU.Wiki: The animation ID to use when the specified button is pressed during a debug session.

animIdOffset2.Wiki: A value to offset animation IDs by. 0 = a00, 10000 = a01, etc.

partsDamageRate1.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate2.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate3.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate4.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate5.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate6.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate7.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

partsDamageRate8.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the mesh assigned as this part.

weakPartsDamageRate.Wiki: The multiplier to apply to incoming damage against the weak point part.

superArmorRecoverCorrection.Wiki: The change to apply to poise recovery speed for this character.

superArmorBrakeKnockbackDist.Wiki: The knockback distance for the stagger when this character's poise is broken.

stamina.Wiki: The maximum stamina for this character.. Used for non c0000 enemies blocking in DS1

staminaRecoverBaseVel.Wiki: The recovery speed for stamina for this character.

def_phys.Wiki: The flat physical damage defense this character possess.

def_slash.Wiki: This value is applied to the flat physical defense when the sub-type matches. For example: 10 = +10% defense, -10 = -10% defense

def_blow.Wiki: This value is applied to the flat physical defense when the sub-type matches. For example: 10 = +10% defense, -10 = -10% defense

def_thrust.Wiki: This value is applied to the flat physical defense when the sub-type matches. For example: 10 = +10% defense, -10 = -10% defense

def_mag.Wiki: The flat magic damage defense this character possess.

def_fire.Wiki: The flat physical damage defense this character possess.

def_thunder.Wiki: The flat physical damage defense this character possess.

defFlickPower.Wiki: Innate deflection defense. Deflected attacks can have their damage reduced via flickDamageCutRate

resist_poison.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

resist_desease.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

resist_blood.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

resist_curse.Wiki: The flat defense value for this character against the specified resistance type.

ghostModelId.Wiki: The model ID to use for the wandering ghost version of this character.

normalChangeResouceId.Wiki: The resource ID to use for the normal texture.

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense generation range angle when guarding (horizontal direction). In degrees.

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

blowGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

superArmorDurability.Wiki: The amount of poise this character has. Requires dmgLevel to be set to function properly.

normalChangeTexChrId.Wiki: The resource ID to use for the character texture.

dropType.Wiki: Determines behavior and appearance of dropped items.

knockbackRate.Wiki: The rate of knockback suffered from sources of knockback from attackers.

knockbackParamId.Wiki: The parameters to use for knockback.

fallDamageDump.Wiki: The dampening rate to apply to fall damage suffered.

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: The amount to reduce stamina damage by when received by the character.

pcAttrB.Wiki: The amount to add to Black World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

pcAttrW.Wiki: The amount to add to White World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

pcAttrL.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

pcAttrR.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the player) when this character dies.

areaAttrB.Wiki: The amount to add to Black World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

areaAttrW.Wiki: The amount to add to White World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

areaAttrL.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

areaAttrR.Wiki: The amount to add to World Tendency (for the area) when this character dies.

mpRecoverBaseVel.Wiki: The speed at which mana points are restored for this character.

flickDamageCutRate.Wiki: A multiplier to apply to damage if the source has been deflected. 50 = -50% damage, 90 = -90% damage

defaultLodParamId.Wiki: The default LOD parameter to use for this character.

drawType.Wiki: The draw type used for this character. Normally affects the shader used.

npcType.Wiki: The character type assigned to this character.

teamType.Wiki: The team type assigned to this character.

moveType.Wiki: The move type assigned to this character.

lockDist.Wiki: Additional maximum lock-on distance added onto base distance defined in LockCamParam

material_Weak.AltName: Defense Presentation: Sound (on Weak Point Damage)
material_Weak.Wiki: The sound used when weak point is damaged.

materialSfx_Weak.AltName: Defense Presentation: Particle (on Weak Point Damage)
materialSfx_Weak.Wiki: The particles used when weak point is damaged.

partsDamageType.Wiki: Determines if weak parts (such as the head) will be affected by all attacks or just arrow attacks.\nHeadshot animation will be used for weak part attacks if it exists.

maxUndurationAng.Wiki: Maximum angle enemies can rotate vertically while on slopes. Requires isUnduration

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, the guard animation offset to use when being attacked.

burnSfxType.Wiki: The particle type to use when burning.

poisonGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

diseaseGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

bloodGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

curseGuardResist.Wiki: The absorption to apply to damage of the specified type when guarding.

parryAttack.Wiki: The attack power value to use when calculating a parry as the parrying side.

parryDefence.Wiki: The defense power value to use when calculating a parry as the parried side.

sfxSize.Wiki: The size of the particles used by this character.

pushOutCamRegionRadius.Wiki: The collision radius for the character in which a camera is pushed away.

hitStopType.Wiki: Determines how enemy is affected by hitstop.

ladderEndChkOffsetTop.Wiki: The offset to apply when determining the top of a ladder (if this character is climbing). In 1/10 metres.

ladderEndChkOffsetLow.Wiki: The offset to apply when determining the top of a ladder (if this character is climbing). In 1/10 metres.

useRagdollCamHit.AltName: Is Ragdoll Collision valid for Camera Collision
useRagdollCamHit.Wiki: If ON, then the character's ragdoll can collide with a camera.

disableClothRigidHit.Wiki: If ON, rigid cloth collision is ignored for this character.

useRagdoll.Wiki: If ON, then ragdoll is used for character to character collision. If false, hitRadius and hitHeight are used instead

isDemon.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with antiDemonDamageRate (anti-demon damage).

isGhost.Wiki: If ON, character is treated as a ghost.

isNoDamageMotion.AltName: Ignore Damage Motion for Dummy Hits
isNoDamageMotion.Wiki: If ON, damage level motion is ignored if the damage suffered is 0.

isUnduration.Wiki: If ON, enemies will rotate vertically on slopes. Rotation angle determines by maxUndurationAng

isChangeWanderGhost.Wiki: If ON, character is valid for the wandering ghost feature.

modelDispMask0.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask1.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask2.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask3.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask4.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask5.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask6.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask7.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask8.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask9.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask10.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask11.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask12.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask13.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask14.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

modelDispMask15.Wiki: Displays the model corresponding to the display mask.

isEnableNeckTurn.Wiki: If ON, then the character's head will oscillate.

disableRespawn.Wiki: If ON, the character will not reset position and behavior when the player rests at a bonfire.

isMoveAnimWait.Wiki: If ON, movement animation will continue during other animations.

isCrowd.Wiki: If ON, this character is considered a crowd character and will use a reduced profile when multiple characters are present.

isWeakSaint.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with antSaintDamageRate (holy damage).

isWeakA.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with antWeakA_DamageRate (occult damage).

isWeakB.Wiki: If ON, character will be affected by weapons with antWeakB_DamageRate (anti-darkwraith damage).

vowType.Wiki: The pledge type used by this character.

disableInitializeDead.Wiki: If true, dead enemies will be alive again when the game is reset without respawning enemies (such as quitting to menu)

Option.Name: Covenant: Blade of the Dark Moon
